parameters.name: ImageName
parameters.description: The name of the custom image.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the RDS Custom instance.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the DescribeRegions operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: SnapshotId
parameters.description: The ID of the snapshot from which to create the custom image. You can call the DescribeRCSnapshots operation to query the snapshot ID.
